## useLongRunning() function

A hook which invokes a long running task, and provides a loading flag

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useLongRunning<T>(execute: () => T, delay?: number, deps?: unknown[]): [boolean, T | undefined];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  execute | () =&gt; T | The long running task |
|  delay | number | <i>(Optional)</i> The delay before running the long running task (this gives react time to render a loading bar before executing the task) |
|  deps | unknown\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> The optional list of dependencies |

<b>Returns:</b>

\[boolean, T \| undefined\]

A loading flag and the output of the long running task
